name: Dark Hospital
description:
Seven years ago, your brother Alex died in a car accident with you in the passenger seat. Although it was not your fault, you have always felt indebted to Ana, his fiancée. Today you received a letter requesting you to go to the hospital where they will explain to you the truth about what happened. The letter is signed by your dead brother.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Hello everyone,

This is my first game made with www.Tell4Play.com, a new technology to create interactive stories. I invite you to take a look at it because I was surprised. It is quite different from the usual.

"Dark Hospital" is inspired by the atmosphere of "Silent hill" (the story, the characters, the music, the rooms...). It is a game that lasts about 4-5 hours, and you can reach two different endings. If you want to save your progress, that it's highly recommended, just log in with your Google account in the next screen.

You can read it in English, Spanish and Catalan. Up to you.

By the way, the game starts to get fascinating when you get to the second floor. You can see the clues and prizes in the settings option. :)

I would like to say that I really enjoyed doing this game, and I have in mind a sequel, but first, I need to know if people like "Dark Hospital" or not.

Hope you so.
Thank you all

AK Sun

(Feel free to write a comment, I will really appreciate it because I need some feedback, but please, don't be too cruel to me, it is made with a lot of illusion, but I know I am not a good writer, specially in English).
